historyItem.sql: select id acode, name description from ca_badge_layout cbl where (trim(:q) is null or lower(id || ' ' || name) like lower('%' || trim(:q) || '%' )) and cbl.type = 'image' and safe_request_permissions_pak.check_permission_sql ( :Uidtoken, '(kioskmonitormenu)', 'holdingPanelOption', 'GET' ) = 'Y' order by lower(id)
